trans-unit.source: Represents a control that when clicked displays an associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> from which the user can select a single item.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle que, quando clicado, exibe um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> associado no qual o usuário pode selecionar um único item.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> looks like <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>, but it shows a drop-down area when the user clicks it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> parece que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>, mas ele mostra uma área lista suspensa quando o usuário clica neles.

trans-unit.source: Hide or show the drop-down arrow by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ocultar ou exibir a seta suspensa definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton> that displays items that overflow the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> hosts um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflowButton> que exibe os itens de estouro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> to activate familiar drop-down controls such as color pickers.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> para ativar os controles de lista suspensa familiares como selecionadores.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> property to `true` to more clearly indicate to the user that further options are available on the drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> propriedade `true` para maior clareza indicar ao usuário que opções adicionais estão disponíveis na lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> controls when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir exibe três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> controla quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The buttons change the foreground color of the form.
trans-unit.target: Os botões de alteram a cor de primeiro plano do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria e inicializa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> controle.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class that displays the specified image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> que exibe a imagem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> que exibe o texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class that displays the specified text and image.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class that displays the specified text and image and raises the <see langword="Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados e aciona o evento <see langword="Click" />.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> containing the items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> que contém os itens do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser exibido no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> a ser exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The event handler for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos para o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click" />.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> class that has the specified name, displays the specified text and image, and raises the <see langword="Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> que tem o nome especificado, que exibe a imagem e o texto especificados e que aciona o evento <see langword="Click" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the <see langword="Text" /> property or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText" /> property for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a propriedade <see langword="Text" /> ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ToolTipText" /> para dica de ferramenta <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> deve ser usada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text" /> property for the ToolTip; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Para usar o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text" /> propriedade para a dica de ferramenta; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: A new accessibility object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Um novo objeto de acessibilidade para essa instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> instance returned by this method supports the UI Automation expand/collapse pattern.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> retornada por esse método de instância compatível com o padrão de expandir/recolher de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: However, it's only available in applications that are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or later versions and are either recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or opt in to this .NET Framework accessibility enhancements by using an AppCompat switch.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, só está disponível em aplicativos que estão em execução no .NET Framework 4.7.1 ou versões posteriores e o é recompilado para direcionar o .NET Framework 4.7.1 ou aceitar esse aprimoramentos de acessibilidade do .NET Framework, usando uma opção de AppCompat.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [migration guide](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [guia de migração](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

trans-unit.source: Creates a generic <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> genérico para o qual os eventos podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> for which events can be defined.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> para o qual os eventos podem ser definidos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to display the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> that is defined as the default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> definida como o padrão será exibida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseDown" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseLeave" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseLeave" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnMouseLeave(System.EventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.MouseUp" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint" />.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.OnPaint(System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a value indicating whether the drop-down list of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> has items.
trans-unit.target: Recupera um valor que indica se a lista suspensa do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" /> contém itens.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the drop-down list has items; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a lista suspensa contiver itens; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
trans-unit.target: para todas as janelas de herança de classes para chamar esse método.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumeração associada: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow.AllWindows" /> valor <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionWindow" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an arrow is displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />, which indicates that further options are available in a drop-down list.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se uma seta é exibida no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />, o que indica que mais opções estão disponíveis em uma lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show an arrow on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para mostrar uma seta de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria e inicializa um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton.ShowDropDownArrow%2A> é definida como `false`.
